medium: Ink, colors, and gold leaf on silk
title: Rakan with Bodhisattva
text: This painting was part of a set of 16 rakan. The Clark collections held five, two are at the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York, another two are at the Brooklyn Museum of Art, and one is at the Cleveland Museum of Art. The remaining six are lost.
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
